tool_description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title.
name: OTT details
title: OTT details

api_list.name: Advanced Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for a movie or tvshow based on various parameters such as release year , imdb rating , genre , language etc.

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year between 1970 to 2020 to get results.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Enter values highestrated , lowestrated , latest , oldest to  sort results accodingly .

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple genre eg : action,horror

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple values , eg : english,german

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year from 1970 to 2020 to  get results.

api_list.name: Basic Info
api_list.description: Get info on a  cast such as name , profession , birth and death year , bio , poster , best titles  etc.

api_list.name: Params
api_list.description: Get array of values that can be used as params in Advanced Search .

required_parameters.name: param
required_parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search for a movie or tvshow based on the given 'title '.

api_list.name: Title Details
api_list.description: Get basic information on a movie or tv show such as imdbid , title , genre , runtime , imdbrating , language , synopsis , type , imageurl  , Streaming platforms info etc.

api_list.name: Additional Title Details
api_list.description: Get  additional details for a movie or tv show like reviews  , quotes , plotsummary , number of votes , trailer url  , cast details etc.

api_list.name: OTT Providers
api_list.description: Get  information on OTT platforms we suuport .

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: currently only USA and India region is supported enter param 'US' for USA and 'IN' for India.

api_list.name: New Arrivals
api_list.description: Get the latest arrivals from different platforms .

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description: Use 'IN' for India and 'US' for USA , * currently we support only US and Indian region.
